OrgName.entry: LONGLEY AVENUE WEST HOUSEHOLD WASTE RECYCLING CENTRE

Desc.entry: Household rubbish can be disposed of free of charge. Recycle: Paper, Glass, Plastics, Steel Cans, Aluminium Cans, Furniture, Motor Oil, Mobile Phones, Domestic Paint, Green Waste, Books, Card, Rubble, Shoes, Car Batteries, Scrap Metal, Electrical and Electronic Equipment, Wood, Household Batteries, Fluorescent tubes and mixed lamps. No trade waste.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Sun 8am-7.30pm (Apr-Sep), Mon-Sun 8am-5.30pm (Oct-Mar), in line with British Summertime, closed Christmas Day, Boxing Day & New Years Day
